title: Police Search X’s Premises in France as Prosecutors Summon Elon Musk
summary_full: The move followed a yearlong investigation into X and escalated a wider standoff between European officials and American tech companies over the regulation of social media.
summary_public: The move followed a yearlong investigation into X and escalated a wider standoff between European officials and American tech companies over the regulation of social media.

FR.label: positive
